title: Check Subcontractor Bonding Capacity
description: Before awarding a large subcontract, a contract manager must verify that the subcontractor has sufficient bonding capacity.

tasks.description: Request a letter from the subcontractor's surety company stating their single project and aggregate bonding limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal request is sent to the subcontractor.

tasks.description: Receive and review the surety letter.
Verify that the subcontract value is within the subcontractor's stated single project limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the subcontractor has adequate bonding capacity for the job.
